title:
Universal Composition

attachments.displayName:
Universal Composition
Two lives that live in unison in a bond that cannot break,
a love nothing can tear asunder, a love neither will forsake.
On a strong foundation they stand, storms they survive together,
miles of endless road they are delighted to be on forever.
In the dawns translucent light they gaze upon each others face,
eyes fixed in adoration of one another’s grace.
They serve as each others strength and as each others pillar,
for in one another’s arms, even the darkest nights are stiller.
In nocturnal slumber they dream the same dreams,
of love and of laughter and golden moon beams.
They are truly two hearts that in time beat as one,
and in faith and trust their love cannot be undone.
He is serves as her King; she serves as his Queen,
draped in a universal composition that is tranquil and serene.
Wendy
